settings.content: Theme settings allow designers to provide an easy way for any user to customize the look and feel of their shop without having to delve into HTML or CSS code. Please see our [help page on theme settings](http://docs.shopify.com/themes/theme-templates/settings) to learn more about how you can make the theme customizable.

settings.label: Primary
settings.info: Used for text links, and primary buttons

settings.label: Secondary
settings.info: Used for secondary buttons

settings.label: Custom logo
settings.info: 450 x 200px .png

settings.label: Max logo width
settings.info: Defined in pixels. Do not add the 'px' unit.

settings.label: Icon

settings.label: Banner Image
settings.info: 2500 x 2000px .jpg (maximum)

settings.label: Main Heading Text
settings.info: Largest text in overlay, it is automatically made to be all upper-case.

settings.label: Pre Heading Text
settings.info: Smaller text than the main, usually comes before the main heading. Automatically upper-case.

settings.label: Smaller Copy Text
settings.info: This text is above the button, and only avaliable on larger resolution screens. It is case-sensitive.

settings.label: Button Text
settings.info: The text inside the button. Automatically upper-case. Default: Come on Inside

settings.label: Button Link
settings.info: Any URL is suitable here, this is the location the button will lead visitors.

settings.label: YouTube iFrame Code
settings.info: You need to grab the EMBED link from the share section of youtube. it will look like: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/kTOUlnCyXxA" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

settings.label: Text to show above all the sales items.
Background Image
settings.info: 600px height is best, 2000px width is good too, but be mindful that the full width is unlikely to show, so one side should be able to be hidden as the page resizes.

settings.label: Mobile Background Image
settings.info: 600px height is best, 768px width is the widest it will be, but be mindful that the full width is unlikely to show, so one side should be able to be hidden as the page resizes.
